traited_facts.description: Nondamaging conditions currently on you are ineffective; stacks duration.

results.description: Damage foes with a spread of icy arrows that cause chill. Extra projectiles are launched for each stack of Water Arrow accumulated.

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 66%; skill cooldown increased by 66%; stacks duration.

facts.text: Increased Arrows per Water Arrow Stack

name: Frost Fan

results.description: Legendary Demon. Heal yourself. Heal more for each condition currently applied to you.
name: Empowering Misery

traited_facts.description: Nondamaging conditions currently on you are ineffective; stacks duration.

results.description: Legendary Centaur. Will the tablet toward the target location.
name: Ventari's Will

results.description:
Legendary Centaur. Force energy to erupt from the tablet, knocking down nearby foes and healing nearby allies. 

If this skill is empowered, knockdown duration is increased.
name: Energy Expulsion

results.description: Hurl your weapon at enemies, striking foes in its path.
name: Hammer Bolt

results.description: Create a rift from the Mists that blocks incoming attacks. When the rift closes it blinds foes in front of you.

facts.description: Next outgoing attack misses; stacks duration.

name: Warding Rift
Abismo de guardia

results.description: Send the energy of Glint toward the target area, granting protection to allies before releasing a burst of energy that heals allies and granting protection again when it returns to you.

facts.description: Incoming strike damage decreased by 33%; stacks duration.

name: Envoy of Exuberance
Transfert d'exubérance

results.description: Channel a shield from the Mists to protect you, blocking attacks and regenerating health.
name: Crystal Hibernation

results.description: Legendary Alliance. Grant regeneration and cleanse conditions from allies in the targeted area, healing them for each condition removed. Gain endurance for each affected ally, and gain additional endurance for each condition removed.

facts.description: Gain health every second; stacks duration.

name: Tree Song

results.description: Legendary Alliance. Heal allies in an area.
name: Selfless Spirit

results.description: Legendary Alliance. Become the Urn of Saint Viktor, taking continuous damage while healing nearby allies. You take reduced damage while in this state, but you cannot be healed.

facts.description: Heal nearby allies, gain increased movement speed, and receive reduced incoming damage. You take damage every second and cannot be healed.

name: Urn of Saint Viktor

results.description: Slam your Urn into the ground, ending the ability. Grant boons and heals allies based on your health threshold.

facts.description: Gain health every second; stacks duration.

results.description: Leap through the Mists to the target area. When you land, damage and chill foes in an area, then teleport back to your previous location.

name: Phase Smash

results.description: Set an explosive that explodes into a puddle of glue, immobilizing foes caught in the explosion and crippling foes in the puddle.
